data.title: Introducing Oracle
data.meta_description: Oracle, a major supplier of information management software, was started in 1977 when Larry Ellison founded Software Development Laboratories (SDL). Though the name changed in 1979 to Relational Software Inc. (RSI), the company continued to innovate database...
